name: Blood and Order
description:
Take control of the blood of the human you inhabit and try to make sure he survives from Thursday to Sunday. Sounds easy, right?

Guess I forget to mention that he is a clumsy, chain smoking drug addict.

Blood and Order is a silly but fun little game four friends made in 2 weeks for a school project. Make sure to read the "How to Play" section in the menu before you start as it might not be completely clear what you need to do.
